exceptionï¼š Exception in thread "main" java.lang.IllegalStateException: Invalid array shape: cannot associate an array with shape [1, 784] with a placeholder of shape [32, 784]:shape is wrong rank or does not match on one or more dimensions at org.nd4j.base.Preconditions.throwStateEx(Preconditions.java:641) at org.nd4j.base.Preconditions.checkState(Preconditions.java:340) at org.nd4j.autodiff.samediff.SameDiff.associateArrayWithVariable(SameDiff.java:1063) at org.nd4j.autodiff.samediff.SDVariable.setArray(SDVariable.java:1482) at org.deeplearning4j.examples.samediff.training.SameDiffTrainingExample.main(SameDiffTrainingExample.java:115)

comments.comment: This works on beta6. We can close this now.
